attributes.background: Hythe Town Council wants to lease or sell for £1 the Hythe Green all 6.7 hectares, to Shepway District Council, for the construction of a large leisure centre which will take up a quarter of the site.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. You petition asks for action from your local  council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor

Shepway District Council has a petitions process:

http://www.shepway.gov.uk/moderngov/mgEPetitionListDisplay.aspx?bcr=1
